description.ko: 빛이 유리를 통과하며 하얀 광선이 선명한 색의 스펙트럼과 기하학적 그림자로 갈라지는 찰나의 순간을 포착한 시네마틱한 탐구입니다.
description.en: A cinematic study of light's journey through glass, capturing the precise moment white light fractures into a vivid spectrum of color and geometric shadows.

prompt: Macro photography of a high-clarity crystal prism positioned on a matte black surface. A singular, intense beam of white light strikes the edge, refracting into a brilliant, wide-angle spectrum of rainbow colors. Intricate light patterns, sharp geometric caustics, and ethereal lens flares dancing across the shadows. Hyper-realistic, 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, shallow depth of field, focused on the point of chromatic dispersion.
